Author: thinraindrop
Text: Try and find some order in all the chaos. Maybe organize something in your house? Or write down a meal plan for the upcoming days so you won't have to worry each day again. I find that when I'm organized in my life, my mental state is much more relaxed and happy. Try and find happiness in the things you like to do that make you unique,so finding joy in those things will help you find a little joy in being you. You are worthy and we are here with and for you.
